report.title: Intense Focus, Slight Euphoria
report.author: Wilhelm S.
report.bodytext: Managed to get some IAP. Setting was pretty good - went out to party with some friends. Had some internal issues to work out. /n /n t.0:00 - Took 35mg in a gelcap, carefully weighed out. /n t.0:15 - First alerts -- I was on an empty stomach. /n t.1:00 - Slight euphoric rush. Sort of like a small % of an mdma rush. /n t.1:30 - Dosage bumped by 10mg. /n t.2:00 - First get a chance to catagorize my mindset. _really_ awake! Head feels light. This is nice. Sort of like mdma without the rolling empathy vibes. /n t.4:00 - Dosage bumped by 10mg. /n t.5:00 - Plenty of energy for dancing -- but I don't have to. Not an uncomfortable energy. Feels like it's impossible to be bored. I test this by staring at the wall for a few minutes. I'm not bored! Not sure where my head is -- it's like my capacity to be bored has been turned off. /n t.8:00 - Finally coming down slightly but I had a few hours left in me. Decide to take a sleeping pill to allow sleep. /n /n Notes: This lasts a long time. Be prepared. It's also no substitute for mdma -- but might be a great tool for writing, etc, anything that required some intense concentration. This is not a plain old amphetamine. There is some great introspective healing inside of it -- but that's harder to capture in a trip report.
